name: Eyasin Arafat
details:
Teacher’s Qualifications & Profile

Hafiz al-Qur’an
Successfully completed the full memorization of the Holy Qur’an with correct Tajweed and proper pronunciation.

Takhmīl fī al-Ḥadīth
Graduated from Jami‘ah Madaniyyah Baridhara, Gulshan, Dhaka, specializing in Hadith sciences, with a deep understanding of classical texts and authentic narrations.

Bachelor’s Degree (Ongoing)
Currently pursuing an Honours degree at the International Islamic University Chattogram (IIUC), Department of Sciences of Hadith and Islamic Studies, focusing on advanced research and integration of modern and classical Islamic knowledge.


Additional Skills & Experience
Proficient in Tajweed and fluent in Qur’anic recitation with accurate pronunciation.

Strong foundation in Fiqh, Aqeedah, Tafsir, and other Islamic sciences.

Experienced in teaching students of various age groups, maintaining a balanced approach between traditional and contemporary educational methods.

Committed to supporting students’ spiritual and academic development.

Personal Vision
Dedicated to spreading authentic Islamic knowledge through education, empowering the new generation to confidently and wisely implement the Qur’an and Sunnah in their daily lives.
